title: DiffMIC-v2: Medical Image Classification via Improved Diffusion Network
details: Y Yang, H Fu, AI Aviles-Rivero, Z Xing, L Zhu - IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging, 2025
abstract: Recently, Denoising Diffusion Models have achieved outstanding success in generative image modeling and attracted significant attention in the computer vision community. Although a substantial amount of diffusion-based research has focused …
